entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Flurries over northern sections late in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Flurries over northern sections in the evening and after midnight. Snow level rising to 1800 metres before morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm over northern sections. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
